description: Sam's eyes are on the wrong prize. Busy chasing Zanni's assassins across Delassia, Sam is unaware that he's made a bitter enemy of one of the craftiest men in the galaxy, one who today will take from Sam, with a cold and calculating precision, something very dear to his heart.

Tchlusarud, Sam's lifelong enemy, comes before his mortal foe begging for aid against a common adversary, and to make matters worse, the news he bargains with is horrifying! The two women in Sam's life are in mortal danger, and to save one, Sam must sacrifice the other!

Last issue, Sam was forced to make a horrifying choice... and now, Sultan Ronolo must pay the consequences! In order to get to his foe, however, Sam will have to battle his way single-handed through Ronolo's protectors... the entire Planetary Union army! Action! Action! Action!

The outcome of the Union/Saurian war comes down to one man's decision! It's up to Sam to take a gamble that could spell Union victory, or cost the lives of thousands of soldiers! His choice will surprise you, but not nearly as much as it will stun the Planetary Union!

Thanks to the machinations of Yala of the First, Sam finds himself in a strange land, at the mercy of a mysterious Sigil-bearer who has his own war to win! Meanwhile, with Sam removed from the playing field, the Union/Saurian war takes a devastating turn!

Without Sam to oppose him, the Warlord Khyradon has begun his relentless march across the worlds of the Planetary Union! Somehow, some way, a rebel force must be led against him... but who will rise to such a suicidal challenge? The answer will surprise you!

The story of Altwaal, the first leader of the First, continues, but a new set of players has taken up the tale, and a new level is added to the mystery of what happened to the legendary warrior. And why is the question being raised again, after so many centuries, of what happened to Altwaal?
name: The Tale of Altwaal

description: For centuries, the First have thought that their original leader, Altwaal, perished during the creation of the Eidolon rift. Now things are happening that may tie his disappearance into the Eidolon to murder.

All about Seahn! During a remembrance ceremony for Kerspan, Seahn plots his revenge on the elders who "forced" Kerspan's death to happen. This issue touches on Seahn's history, the formation of his group of friends, and his strange power to sense opportunity, as he looks for the new opportunity here. Meanwhile, Persha tries to work her way around Ingra's spell of compulsion. Orium gave her a lot of information, but she can't share it with anyone.
name: Ingra's Lament

description: Gannish, plagued by the unexplained phenomenon he witnessed ? the creation of a new being by Enson ? now makes the difficult journey to the far side of the Eidolon rift to question him about it. Meanwhile, Ingra's set her sights on Seahn, thinking that they might be useful to each other.
name: Crossing the Rift

description: Gannish and Yala's discreet relationship is the biggest open secret in the history of the First, but now Persha threatens to make it public. Meanwhile, Ingra's becoming discontent with ruling only half the First, and she begins to recruit the players who will help her overthrow Pyrem's side: Braag, who made this mistake once before; and that new rebel Seahn.
name: In Search of Prey

description: There's a stranger running wild through Elysia, and the event sends shockwaves through the entire city! Among the few not caught up in the disturbance are Gannish, Yala, and Persha, meeting to exchange secrets, yet Yala may not let Persha leave with hers... Meanwhile, an even greater event occurs ... the alliance of Seahn and Ingra.

Persha and her father have never met face-to-face. So she slips through the Eidolon to stage a meeting that will change both their lives. Meanwhile, Seahn "convinces" a few of his fellow First to join his crusade to overturn Pyrem's rule, no matter what it takes, and Gannish's quest leads him to a small, semi-populated world battling the Negation.

What caused the animosity between Gannish and Ingra? Now that Gannish has new knowledge about the nature of the First, can he find the strength to defy her wishes? On the other side of Elysia, Pyrem finds himself preparing to make a heavy decision: do the needs of the many outweigh the life of one? Seahn is conspiring to oust Pyrem, and Persha plans her next move... the hunt for Altwaal.

Gammid and Galvan can pool their power to raise the continent of Atlantis, but not without leaving themselves totally defenseless against the Negation! That leaves Capricia, Tug and Zephyre to handle an alien invasion of unprecedented proportion, and those are NOT good odds!

In order to reconnect with friends and loved ones, each of the lost Atlanteans must undergo a Ritual of Memory, a remembrance of times past that will stir within each of them either a cherished moment of joy... or a grim tragedy that can never be forgotten.

The responsibility for last issue's disaster falls squarely on the shoulders of Capricia, and the rest of the team knows it only too well. What ancient Atlantean alchemy will Capricia unveil in order to regain all that she has lost?
Brothers Galvan and Gammid take center stage as the search for the lost human race becomes more focused... and more imperative. Does Danik know more than he's admitting about humanity's whereabouts?
With Geromi's help, the team has at last found others on Earth who claim some knowledge of what happened to the human race... information that will not be given freely.
No more "bugs." Now that they've learned to take Capricia's team seriously, the Negation has sent their best assassin after them. His mission: bring the Atlanteans back dead... not alive!

The disaster in Australia has catapulted Verityn and Danik back through the millennia to very familiar territory, giving them a chance to put right what once went wrong. Can they change the sequence of events that originally sank Atlantis... and, more importantly, should they?

At the end of last issue, Capricia suddenly became privy to one of the most important secrets in the CrossGen Universe... and learned just how much she's been manipulated and deceived by one of her best friends since her awakening. Too bad she may not live long enough to get an apology.

The first issue by new Crux scribe Chuck Dixon! The Atlantean heroes are still stalked by the Negation bounty hunter and one will suffer at his hands. Galvan receives a strange communication from his twin with surprising news. In a dream Verityn visits the prehistoric past of Atlantis and his vision sets our heroes on a new trail.

From deep within an inescapable death camp in the heart of Negation Space, the first strike against the ultimate enemy is finally at hand! Even as he and his fellow inmates are forced to perform in daily, lethal tests of brains and brawn, Obregon Kaine discovers a way out of this nightmare. But will the cost of freedom be too much?

Obregon Kaine sets his master plan in motion, and the prisoners make their desperate bid for freedom. But the Negation would rather destroy their prison world than let anyone escape. Against overwhelming odds, Kaine's ability to think fast will decide the fate of a hundred souls. Can he beat the odds and get them out alive?

Obregon Kaine and his fellow escapees finally run into their first bit of luck when they meet a fellow fugitive from the Negation, Captain Fluxor. Aboard Fluxor's starship, they set a course to get as far as possible from the evil empire. But what they'll find will only deepen their predicament.

The Negation's sadistic prison warden, Komptin, is back, and he's got Kaine's group of escapees in his sights. Run to ground on one of the outer worlds of the Negation Imperium, the team must learn fast how to infiltrate an enemy city if they expect to survive. But Kaine will find that blending into a completely alien culture is easy compared to pulling together his bickering comrades into an effective guerilla squad.

Recovering from their first defeat, the escapees regroup under Kaine's leadership to make another attempt to get off the icy Negation world on which they're trapped. But their archenemy Komptin has teamed up with the local Negation commander to tighten the noose around the fugitives. Will Kaine's military leadership win the day? Or will the Lizard Lady's hideous secret tear the team apart from within?

The bad news for Kaine and his fugitives is that they'll have to get away from Komptin's deadly Hunter Squad. The good news is that they'll finally catch up with the other escapees who left them to die back on the Negation prison-world. And when the mighty Evinlea of the First pits her power against the outlaw Sigil-Bearer Mercer Drake, you'd better drop the comic and run for cover!

New readers should get on board now, as Negation embarks on an epic story arc culminating in a head-on confrontation against Charon, god-emperor of the Negation! On the Negation Throneworld, Charon interrogates a mysterious prisoner destined to alter the fate of Obregon Kaine and the fugitives. Meanwhile, Evinlea battles the Sigil-Bearers who left her and the others to die on the prison-world! However this titanic battle turns out, the fugitives will soon have to reckon with the onslaught of the Negation's fearsome Lawbringer!

Brother to a slain warlord, a humble monk possesses a weapon with the power to slay gods... but can he bring himself to use it? Ron Marz and Bart Sears join forces in the first issue of CrossGen's latest monthly title, a tale of all-out samurai action set on a feudal world.

In a world of feudal warlords and samurai warriors, honor is everything. The Obo-san monk has always lived a life of obedience, but now he suspects his Emperor has descended into madness. What will happen when Obo-san is forced to choose between blind loyalty and bitter defiance as his Emperor commands him to take his own life?

Obo-san and Ryuichi, general of Nayado's samurai armies, were boyhood friends. Now they find themselves cast as enemies as the emperor dispatches Ryuichi to find Obo-san, who is fleeing northward with a death sentence on his head. Will Obo-san's path lead him to a deadly confrontation with his friend?

With Arwyn and Gareth seemingly safe at least for the moment, the mysterious wise woman Neven relates the tale of Mordath's resurrection and reception of the sigil that gives him his fiery power. Meanwhile, a detachment of Mordath's fierce troll warriors closes in on the escapees.

The mysterious Neven asks Arwyn to take up the quest for the Five Fragments of Ayden's arrow in hopes of destroying Mordath. But the quest may be over before it begins as Mordath's deadly troll warriors attack!

After a pitched battle with Mordath's troll hordes, Arwyn returns to the site of her burned city. There she must decide whether she will take up the quest for the Five Fragments, or turn away from it.

As Arwyn begins her quest for the Five Fragments, the focus shifts to her despised enemy, Mordath. The undead tyrant ponders both his past and the sigil that has given him sovereignty over the Five Lands... and vows no one will take it from him.

Arwyn and Gareth set out after the first of the Five Fragments, rumored to be part of a legendary dragon's treasure hoard. A mysterious woman appears, claiming to hold the key to their quest, but first Arwyn and Gareth will have to survive a roadside inn where the locals are anything but friendly.

As the legendary warrior Ayden watches from afar, a beautiful woman has led Arwyn and Gareth to a treasure trove that contains the first of the Five Fragments. Unfortunately, the treasure is guarded by a huge dragon who is none too willing to share, a dragon who does share a dark secret with Arwyn and Gareth's new ally!

Arwyn's lone hope of destroying the evil Mordath was to reunite the Five Fragments of Ayden's arrow... or so she thought. But Arwyn may have found a shortcut to toppling the despot by striking an alliance with a mighty dragon. Will the beast's fiery fury be enough to destroy Mordath?

Mordath's castle crumbles around him under the assault of a fearsome dragon, but the undead despot himself won't collapse quite so easily. As Mordath engages in the ultimate firefight, Arwyn creeps closer to taking her lethal revenge against the man responsible for her family's deaths.

Arwyn's attempt to shortcut her quest and wreak her vengeance upon Mordath ended in utter disaster. Now she'll have to deal with the anger of the mysterious and powerful Neven, who set Arwyn upon the quest and gave her the gift of Ayden's bow. Because Neven wants it back!
A Year One Annual. It's the Dark Knight's first encounter with the deadly and deranged botanical genius Poison Ivy.
name: Year 1: Poison Ivy

volume.name: Batman: Shadow of the Bat Annual

description: The Legends of the Dead Earth Annuals continue. As the universe dies, its one remaining man - the Batman - recalls his battles with the forces of evil. In remembering, he gets an idea that may prove to be his salvation.
name: The Shadow of the Bat Falls On... King Batman

volume.name: Batman: Shadow of the Bat Annual

description: Pulp Heroes, the DCU Annuals event, continues in this tribute to the romance magazines of the 1930s. Joe Potato, Gotham's grungiest private eye, falls in love with a beautiful woman who just happens to be Poison Ivy. Batman doesn't want to interfere with the P.I.'s love life, but if he doesn't, Joe is dead.
name: I Was The Love-Slave Of A Plant-Based Killer

volume.name: Batman: Shadow of the Bat Annual

description:
The Elseworlds Annuals, the DC Universe's journey into remote realms of possibility, continue in 19th century Japan, where Robin is a young ninja who must fight to protect his daimyo's life from the cult of assassins that killed his mentor.

A young samurai must fulfill his master's dying wish...even if it kills him.
name: The Narrow Path

description:
The Year One Annuals continue, exploring pivotal events or untold stories of the DC Universe's greatest heroes. It's the expanded origin of Dick Grayson, the first Robin, featuring never-before-revealed details in an incredible retelling of this key DC character's beginnings.

Discover the truth behind the first Robin's origin!
name: Year One

description: The Legends of the Dead Earth Annuals continue. Aboard an interstellar ark on a generations-long journey, the inhabitants are spurred to mutiny against their fascistic masters by a mysterious dark knight...and the young girl who seeks to join his crusade.
name: The Iron Sky

description: Pulp Heroes continues with this tale in the style of 1930s Western magazines. The Trigger Twins are sprung from the hoosegow by their pistol-packin' sister, a purty filly who'll answer a man's smile with hot lead. They aim to empty Gotham's banks and when Robin arrives, there's an old-fashioned, lead-slingin' showdown.
name: The Law West Of Gotham

description:
The most eagerly-awaited sequel in comics begins! Three years after the events in THE DARK KNIGHT RETURNS, Batman knows the world is nowhere near the perfect little place it pretends to be, and he sees the cracks in the system that have been neatly covered up. It's time to find where all the heroes have gone, and the Dark Knight is the right man for the job.

Three years after dissapearing into the shadows, Batman and his allies decide the time is right to return once again.

The issue opens with Carrie Kelley (now called Catgirl) rescuing the Atom from a petrie dish, where he was being held by the government. At the same time we find out there is a planet killing asteroid heading towards earth. Superman is still a lap dog of the state, but this time it is only because the government is holding the bottled city of Kandor hostage. As Carrie rescues the Atom, Batman rescues the Flash who has been forced to run in a human-sized hamster wheel that powers a giant energy generator that runs most of the United States power grid. When the grid collapses, Superman's "handlers" send him to take out the Batman once and for all.
name: DK2

description: Batman, his minions , and the new Justice League decide to make their move against the "government" which we find out is being run by Lex Luthor and Brainiac. Hurt and confused Superman goes off to find Wonder Woman and whines, then the two of them make love. Also their daughter makes her debut as Supergirl, and she decides to join the fight .
name: DK2

description: The "grand finale" to comics' most eagerly-awaited sequel. Let's be honest? You don't want to know what really goes on in this issue before you get a chance to watch it unfold for yourself. So let's just say that it's our humble opinion you aren't going to be disappointed! Frank Miller and Lynn Varley bring their considerable talents to bear on the Batman epic of the decade! The final showdown to save the world from its new masters, and the identity of the Joker like persons is finally revealed
name: DK2

description:
1. She's Out of This World

2. The Triumph of Toni

3. Oh, Those Clothes

4. Goodbye to Chili
name: She's Out of This World!
A Whale of a Time!
Millie Goes Outta Sight!
The Batty Bowling Belles!
Her Double Trouble Blues!

description: Within the Bottle City of Kandor, the new Superman and guest star the Atom vie to keep the rebel faction from setting off a bomb that will do more than pop the bottle's cork! Plus, Scorn wears the old uniform of the Man of Steel, and has become the protector of Ashbury Armstrong, Dirk's daughter!
name: Crisis in Kandor!

description: The climactic battle with Saviour! A battle royal on live television! Scorn, Jimmy Olsen, Cat Grant, Professor Hamilton, Lois Lane, Bibbo and Dirk Armstrong! Along with your host…Whitty Banter!
name: Back to Back With Scorn!

description: GENESIS wreaks havoc on Superman's new powers, but before it does, he discovers an ability he didn't know he had. When captured by the sinister cyber-villains known as the Mainframe, his energy-based powers allow them to open "windows" into other dimensions! All these strange lands are beyond our plane, but the evil Baud and her pals have access to all of them now that they've got the Man Beyond Tomorrow! Plus…meet the Bibbo/Scorn team!
name: Altered States

description: Has the whole world gone crazy? The mysterious leader of the Revenge Squad has sent hordes of Parademons to attack the Outsiders and Lex Luthor! Plus, Boss Moxie has sent Intergang to get the secret of Superman's identity from Jimmy Olsen!
name: Gang War

description:
Part two of the four-part "City of the Future!" Superman and Ashbury accompany Scorn as he enters the bottle city of Kandor for a family reunion with his sister and his father, the Kandorian Regent! Kandor's politics are, as always, in disarray, but a savior has stepped forward: one who believes he can enlarge the city and liberate the population! But is he too good to be true?

Continued from: Action Comics #749

Continues in: Superman #140

"1998 42"--Triangle in upper left hand corner.
name: The Mammoth Monorail Bridge of Kandor

description: It's a maniacal monster party when Simyan and Mokkari—two of Darkseid's most diabolical minions—are hired by Morgan Edge! His plan: to have the duo create a creature factory in the WGBS subbasement…a factory that Edge hopes will create a rival for Superman!
name: Creative Differences

description: Writer Mark Schultz (Xenozoic Tales) is joined by penciller Doug Mahnke (MAJOR BUMMER) as Superman says a last good-bye to his life as Clark Kent. Superman joins Lois and Ma and Pa Kent on the family farm in Smallville for a final family dinner before he closes the book on his Clark Kent identity. Abandoning a personal life he feels is simply too selfish to maintain, the Man of Steel attempts to get the rest of "Team Superman"—guest stars Steel, Superboy and Supergirl—to join him in his 24-7 vigil.
name: The Trial of Team Superman!

description: Superman at last gets some insight into why he's gone overboard, as his obsession with establishing global order attracts the attention of entities with power even greater than his own! But can they pierce the fog that the Man of Steel has surrounded himself with? And what will Superman do when he realizes what he has become?
name: A Kiss Defore Dying

description: Superman has journeyed back through the dimensions, returning to Earth from the Phantom Zone. Now he faces Dominus for what he hopes will be the last time. But the battle raises as many questions as it answers, setting the stage for SUPERMAN: KING OF THE WORLD.
name: Prelude To A Coronation

description: Superman gave one of his robots the sole task of protecting Lois Lane. Its prime directive: to take care of her and never leave her side. But when Superman decides to deactivate the robot, he discovers that he built this particular robot a little too well, and it's not going to give up its responsibilities without a fight!
name: A Girl And Her Robot

description: A sequence written by Mark Schultz, with art by Doug Mahnke and Tom Nguyen, frames the oddest Superman story of the year! Over the course of his career, Superman has managed to trail, trace and track down countless fearsome foes and bring them to justice. But this story is about a guy who thinks the Man of Steel is after him and is sure that Superman is ruining his life at every turn! Is the hapless con imagining things? Or is our hero truly his "Nemesis"?
name: Nemesis

description: "Superman's Strangest Adventure" the strange saga of Superman's "secret origins" concludes with part 4! Why has Superman been convinced that he is a super-hero on Oa, Rann, Thanagar, and now Mars? What strange being holds Superman in his thrall...and is ready to confront the JLA as well? The secrets behind the origins are revealed here!
name: Secret Origins, Part 4: Cogito Ergo Doom!

description: Think you've seen cool monsters? You ain't seen nothing yet! This issue's bizarre amphibian goes up against Superman in a big, big way, holding two young hostages to keep our hero at bay.
name: Terror and Treasure Await...Below!

description: A new era begins with a science-fiction focus on the "strange visitor from another planet!" In the remains of the Fortress of Solitude, there's something very wrong…and very deadly. When Superman and Lois go to investigate, they find themselves face to face with bizarre creatures from the early days of Krypton.
name: Krypton Lives

description: Lori Lemaris came to warn Superman about a threat, but the big red "S" is missing. So now it's up to Lois and Steel to combat the underwater terror of Kosnor and Netkon ? two devil fish that are looking to drown the city!
name: Devils From the Deep!

description: A perilous journey back into the Phantom Zone awaits Superman and Steel, as they jump into unimaginable danger in order to retrieve Luna, leader of the Cyber-Moths. But it seems the villainess has made some friends during her stay, and they're about to give the Super-team a whole lot of trouble!
name: The Phantom Zone Menace!

description: Luthor wins the presidency, and is thrown a ticker tape parade. Meanwhile, Clark and Lois are revealing Clark's secret identity to John Henry Irons (who already figured it out). They go to see the prisoner that Superman had brought back from the Phantom Zone (Luna) only to find that she had broken free. Then, her "pet" Lunatick starts eating all the city's power. Can the Man of Steel stop it before it destroys Lexcorp Towers (or does he even want to) ?
name: Lunatick Fringe

description: Linear Man Lori Lee gives Clark a glimpse into a possible future without Superman ? only to find a world that has been ravaged by war with the heroes having taken to defending its leader Lex Luthor! It's not such a wonderful life without The Man of Steel...
name: It Was a Wonderful Life...

description:
Overview

Guest-starring the Star-Spangled Kid and S.T.R.I.P.E. The daughter/step-father duo joins both Superman and Steel to face the after-shocks of the all-new and terrifying metahuman called Earthquake. But before he's done, he's gonna level Washington D.C.
name: Terror Strikes the Capital!

description:
Overview

Return to Krypton" Part 3. Fugitives of Krypton, Clark and Lois adopt the identity of Kryptonian heroes Nightwing and Flamebird to survive. But in whatever guise, the now powerless Kal-El may not survive the confrontation with General Zod's personal assassins, Kru-El and Faora.
name: Beyond the Proto-Tombs of Xan!

description: " Part 3 of 4. After losing Lois to Viroxx, Superman finds his wife leading the virus to infect more planets. In order to save his wife, Superman must destroy the one thing that could end up saving the lives of millions of others. Meanwhile, Viroxx reveals its next stage of evolution and its next target: Earth.
name: Lois Infected!

description:
Overview

It's the return of the Eradicator, and he brings with him prophesies of the end of our world. If Superman can survive the latest encounter with his old ally, he may learn the startling truth behind the Eradicator's madness. Plus, how does the Eradicator fit into what Superman has just learned about his true origins?
name: The Eradicator: Harbinger of Doom!

description: "OUR WORLDS AT WAR," Part 5. The entire population of Metropolis has been abducted by aliens. Now Clark Kent must wage a battle for freedom against his alien captors, without revealing his Superman identity. But the identity of the abductors and what is to come result in shocking consequences for all.
name: Metropolitan Rapture

description: "OUR WORLDS AT WAR," Part 17. Superman deals with the aftermath of Doomsday's release and the confrontation with Imperiex, only to find himself at odds with his ally Darkseid and Darkseid's own solution to ending the War. Another hero dies as a traitor prevents important information about another enemy from getting to Superman. For more information, see the feature article.
name: Chest Deep in Heroes' Blood

description:
"Pulp Fiction: Keeping Metropolis Safe!" Guest-starring the Newsboy Legion. The villainous Arclight has returned and the Man of Steel is the only one who can stop him. Plus, Jimmy Olsen quits the Daily Planet!

Notes:

  • Jimmy Olsen quits his job at the Daily Planet.
  • Triangle 1995 #31.
  • Chronological continuation from Superman: The Man of Steel #47.
  • Chronological continuation in Adventures of Superman #526.
name: Pulp Friction Keeping Metroplis Safe

description:
"Revenge of Apokolips!" When a Para-Demon from Apokolips arrives in Metropolis, Superman is shocked to learn it's not here to fight. Instead, the former servant of Darkseid has come seeking the Man of Steel's help. Superman faces off with the Lord of Apokolips, plus the return of the Cyborg-Superman.

Notes:

  • Triangle 1995 #35.
  • Chronological continuation from Superman: The Man of Steel #48.
  • Chronological continuation in Adventures of Superman #527.
name: Revenge of Apokolips

description: "Misperceptions!" Guest-starring Green Lantern (Kyle Rayner). Psi-Phon and Dreadnaught (last seen in Adventures of Superman (1939-2006) #442) are back to wreck havoc on the Man of Steel's life. Luckily the new Green Lantern is on hand to help.
name: Misperceptions

description: The Trial of Superman! Part 2 of 12. "Misperceptions!" Story continued from Superman: The Man of Steel #50. When the galactic judicial committee known as the Tribunal abducts the Man of Steel and charges him with being responsible for the destruction of Krypton, Superman has a tough decision to make. Use his great powers to escape this bogus wrap, or stay and face the music, and somehow clear his good name. Story continues in Adventures of Superman (1939-2006) #529.
name: The Trial of Superman!

description: The Trial of Superman! Part 6 of 12. "Bottled Up!" Guest-starring Steel, Superboy, Supergirl, and the Eradicator. Cameos by Metron of the New Gods, Lex Luthor, and the Joker. Story continued from Superman: The Man of Steel #51. The Superman Rescue Squad enter the fray. Plus, Superman attempts to save a shrunken and enslaved bottled city! 1st post-Crisis appearance of the Bottled City of Kandor. Story continues in Adventures of Superman #530.
name: The Trial of Superman!

description: The Trial of Superman! Part 11 of 12. "No Escape!" Guest-starring Steel, Superboy, Supergirl, and the Eradicator. Cameos by Metron of the New Gods, Lex Luthor, and the Joker. Story continued from Superman: The Man of Steel #52. Despite his best efforts, the Man of Steel is unable to clear his name. Will the Tribunal go ahead with Superman's execution or will Earth's greatest hero earn reprieve? Story concludes in Adventures of Superman (1939-2006) #531.
name: The Trial of Superman!

description: Christmas issue. "The Kill Fee!" Every Christmas Eve Superman comes to the Post Office to read letters sent to him from around the world. This year someone is waiting for him. An armored assassin has come gunning for the Man of Steel. Plus, the return of someone from Clark Kent's past. Story continues in Adventures of Superman (1939-2006) #532.
name: The Kill Fee!

description: "The Treasure Hunt Caper!" Guest-starring Plastic Man. Get ready for the most off-the-wall team-up of all time. Superman and the perplexing Plastic Man go a round with competing siblings with a knack for treasure hunting.
name: The Treasure Hunt Caper

description:
Lori Lemaris-Clark Kent's college love whom he thought was dead, and who just so happens to be a mermaid-is back. And, Superman and Lois Lane's relationship falls on turbulent times.

After the breakup with Lois, Kent begins to question her motives and becomes angry with having to oblige to his duties as a hero which conflict with his time spent with Lois. Superman and Lori Lemaris work together to retrieve Jeb's dead body that fell in the sea, using Lori's knowledge of the sea and Superman's vision they stumble upon the body already picked at by sharks. Kent reveals his situation with Lois to Lori and expresses his frustration at not being able to have a normal life. Kent then becomes determined to get Lois back.
name: Divisions

description:
Professor Thaddeus Killgrave attempts to escape from prison, leaving the Man of Steel with an impossible choice…save the prison guards and star reporter Lois Lane from a rampaging robot, or recapture the fleeing villain. Plus, Superman and Lois Lane break up!

As Superman battles a prison break on Strikers Island, Morgan Edge escapes. Meanwhile, Lois Lane tries to have a conversation with Superman regarding their relationship, they are interrupted by a call for Superman's help. She urges him to go, although it appears she would rather him stay but she doesn't want to be selfish. This seemingly marks the end of Lois and Clark's relationship.
name: Superman's Ex-Girlfriend Lois Lane

description:
1st appearance of the Electric Blue Superman. "Superman...Reborn!" A startling transformation has come over the Last Son of Krypton. His powers have changed. Get ready for the all-new Superman! A Man of Steel no more, now a man of lightning fast justice.

The cover glows in the dark!
name: Superman...Reborn!

description: "A Hard Days Night!" Guest-starring Booster Gold. Booster and Superman together again! But things sure have changed for the two heroes since the last time they teamed up. Can this odd couple with a turbulent history help each other get back on track? Plus, Scorn makes a startling discovery.

"Retribution!" Guest-starring the Atom. As Superman continues his adventure in the Bottle City of Kandor, the Atom tries desperately to prevent a terrible disaster from befalling the diminutive city. Plus, a new look for Scorn.
name: Retribution
